meanings.definition: Edit (a photograph) using Adobe Photoshop software.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy photoshopping pictures of my pets to make them look funny.
meanings.sent2: She is photoshopping her profile picture to remove a blemish.
meanings.sent3: After photoshopping his friend's face onto a cat's body, they couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: Photoshopping the sky to be a vibrant pink creates a dreamy effect.
meanings.sent5: The artist spent hours photoshopping the landscape to perfection.

meanings.definition: The act of altering or manipulating a photograph using digital editing software.
meanings.sent1: Photoshopping can make a picture look completely different from the original.
meanings.sent2: Her photoshopping skills are impressive, making her photos stand out.
meanings.sent3: The photoshopping of the family portrait made everyone look like cartoon characters.
meanings.sent4: The photoshopping of reality in the magazine created an unrealistic standard.
meanings.sent5: The photoshopping of the image gave it a surreal and magical quality.
